ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Status__c)) && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Final") && OR(ISBLANK(Fee__c), Count_of_Estimated_Travel_Costs__c < 1, Count_of_Estimated_Venue_Costs__c < 1, ISBLANK(Main_Venue__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To mark a course as final requires a course fee, main venue and estimated travel & venue costs. Please ensure you've completed all of these.
